meanings.sent1: She checked her phone beses to make sure she didn't miss any messages.
meanings.sent2: He always sings beses in the shower.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed beses to get her attention.
meanings.sent4: The clock chimed beses, reminding her of the passing hours.
meanings.sent5: The teacher repeated the instructions beses for the students to understand.

meanings.definition: A unit of time equal to 60 seconds.
meanings.sent1: He set the timer for three beses to boil the eggs.
meanings.sent2: She counted down the last few beses before the race started.
meanings.sent3: The microwave beeped three beses to signal the food was ready.
meanings.sent4: The runner finished the race in a matter of beses.
meanings.sent5: The meeting lasted only a few beses before everyone left.
